item.title: Two lawmakers seek to find Bondi in contempt over Epstein files
item.description: Top Justice Department official defends redactions and deletion of documents on agency’s website, including one of a photo that includes Trump.

item.title: Epstein files include child porn complaint a decade before federal investigation
item.description: Maria Farmer has long claimed that she warned the FBI about Jeffrey Epstein in the 1990s but that the agency ignored her complaint.
